title: Resource Deployed
description: Indicates which specific resource, originally requested, has been deployed (moved out) and at what time.

resourceRequestId.title: Resource Request ID
resourceRequestId.description: The unique identifier of the original resource request.

resourceId.title: Resource ID
resourceId.description: Unique identifier of the deployed resource.

resourceType.title: Resource Type
resourceType.description: Type of the deployed resource (from resource type catalog).

deployedAt.title: Deployed At
deployedAt.description: Timestamp when the resource was deployed (moved out).
